snippet.title: Batman: Arkham Knight – Crime Fighter Challenge Pack #4
snippet.description:
Batman: Arkham Knight – Crime Fighter Challenge Pack #4

Batman: Arkham Knight – Season Pass DLC Videos Playlist:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL7N-XnsRG9lw96wNsxCJ7IWDaGr477D2p

***************************************************

Quarantine (0:03) - Ranked Challenge

Combat Stars:
● 03 - Score 30,000 points.
● 02 - Score 20,000 points.
● 01 - Score 10,000 points.

Total Score: 153,110

Character Skin: Robin

-

Credit Crunch (6:38) - Ranked Challenge

Predator Stars:
● Shield bash 3 thugs.
● Finish with a fear takedown.
● Takedown 3 thugs without moving.

Time Taken: 1:34.44

Character Skin: Original Tim Drake Robin

-

Wild Cat (8:45) - Ranked Challenge

Combat Stars:
● 03 - Score 50,000 points.
● 02 - Score 30,000 points.
● 01 - Score 15,000 points.

Total Score: 430,625

Character Skin: Classic TV Series Catwoman

-

Divine Intervention (11:45) - Ranked Challenge

Predator Stars:
● No silent takedowns.
● Perform a takedown through a glass roof.
● Perform an environment takedown on the drone controller.

Time Taken: 1:53.72

Character Skin: Azrael

-

Clockwork (15:04) - Ranked Challenge

Combat Stars:
● 03 - Score 22,000 points.
● 02 - Score 13,000 points.
● 01 - Score 06,500 points.

Total Score: 53,145

Character Skin: 2016 Batman v Superman Batman

-

High Flyers (18:50) - Ranked Challenge

Predator Stars:
● Glide kick an enemy with Robin.
● Perform a ledge takedown with Nightwing.
● Alternate takedowns between the duo.

Time Taken: 1:42.93

Characters Skins: Nightwing & Robin

***************************************************

Game available on: PlayStation 4, Xbox One & PC
Video recorded on: Playstation 4

PSN: TheArkhamChannel

***************************************************

This is a channel mainly focused on providing the Arkham fans with all the latest news, official trailers, and gameplay videos about the Arkham games. The channel is not affiliated with Rocksteady Studios or WB Games.

Subscribe here:
http://goo.gl/vx4waB

Follow TheArkhamChannel on:

● YouTube: https://youtube.com/TheArkhamChannel
● Facebook: https://facebook.com/TheArkhamChannel
● Twitter: https://twitter.com/ArkhamChannel
● Google+: https://plus.google.com/+TheArkhamChannelLive
